full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Acquisition of Electric Vehicles' Batteries Cycler

### Reference Information
* Solicitation Number: WS3606176926
* Reference Number: Doc3732975060
* Tender Closing Date: November 17, 2022, at 14:00 EST

### Tender Description
This tender announcement cancels and supersedes previous solicitation number Doc3609777977, dated September 2, 2022, with a closing date of September 27, 2022, at 14:00 EST. A debriefing session will be provided upon request to bidders who submitted proposals in the previous solicitation.

All required supporting documentation and bids must be submitted no later than 2 PM EST on November 17, 2022. Bids received after this deadline will be deemed non-responsive.

### Request for Proposal
The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of an electric vehicles' batteries cycler, including delivery to Boucherville, Quebec, Canada, as detailed in Annex A.

### Contract Information
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entity: National Research Council of Canada (NRC)
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Alina Cocieru (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

### UNSPSC Classification
* 41113600: Electrical measuring and testing equipment and accessories
